snippet: The minister withdrew at the last minute from an international security conference in Munich after learning that Israeli diplomats might take part.
abstract: Turkish Foreign Min Mevlut Cavusoglu withdraws from international security conference in Germany after learning that Israeli diplomats would be attending; stresses move is not aimed at host country and says lower-level representative will be sent instead.

byline.contributor: Jodi Rudoren contributed reporting from Jerusalem.

lead_paragraph: The minister withdrew at the last minute from an international security conference in Munich after learning that Israeli diplomats might take part.

headline.main: At Diplomatic Conference, Turkey-Israel Rift Worsens
headline.print_headline: At Diplomatic Conference, Turkey-Israel Rift Worsens
